metadata.Title: CVE-2021-34866 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: [Unknown description] Ryota Shiga discovered that the eBPF implementation in the Linux kernel did not enforce that ringbuf helpers were not used with different BPF map types. A local attacker could use this to possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.11.0-38.42').
linux-aws package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.11.0-1020.21').
